review_title: Great tool that got the job done
reviews:
I initially tried to remove the watch links using a small screwdriver and then a nail with a regular sized hammer, but was not successful. Using the plastic strap holder and the pins made all the difference.Glad I was able to do the job myself and not needing to spend $15 at the jewelry store. Only complaint is that the three pin punchers all have the same diameter, but should still be suitable for most watch links.
Under $5, you don't need to think much before purchasing.

Very happy with the hat. It is warm and fits well.
Item is Made in USA.

Really happy with the mattress protector. I have yet to spill any liquids on my mattress, but I can definitely affirm that the mattress protector feels very durable and well constructed. I ordered a second protector for my sister's mattress as well. I'm sure it will protect my mattress well. Above all, the price is very affordable for the protection it offers.

review_title: Excellent flashlight and at superb price
reviews:
I wanted to buy a cheap flashlight to keep in my car's glove compartment. Can't always rely on the smartphone flashlight app and wanted to have a back-up.
While it doesn't compare to my other $70 flashlight made by Fenix in terms of beam and build quality, I must admit that I was surprised to find out how bright this flashlight is, considering it only requires a single AA battery. The fact that it has an SOS strobe mode and a low intensity function is a big plus. Build quality is quite satisfactory for a flashlight and is at par with most flashlights.
A definite steal for under $5
